gov.nasa.jpl.iondtn.gui.MainFragments

Class ConfigurationFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • gov.nasa.jpl.iondtn.gui.MainFragments.ConfigurationFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, OnIonStatusChangeListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigurationListFragment, StatusFragment

    public abstract class ConfigurationFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements OnIonStatusChangeListener
    Base class for all configuration/status fragments used in IonDTN Modifies behaviour including update routines when the ION status changed
